name: Panda Jumper
description:
Panda wakes up in an ancient ruin flying high in the sky and he needs to get to the other end.

Main feature:
  • Change of seasons
  • Platform with unique mechanics of the interaction
  • Double jump
  • Ability to survive after losing balance
Controls: 
  • Any key

Hi, I've been developing this game for quite some time. At first I wanted to make a simple jumping game for mobile phones in a couple of days, but then the game started to get more detailed and I decided to do something more serious.
